title: Goblin Scavengers (1C179)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Moria
Twilight:	3
Card Type:	Minion • Orc
Strength:	8
Vitality:	1

Game Text:	When you play this minion, you may play a weapon from your discard pile on your [Moria] Orc.
Lore:	”'The Orcs have often plundered Moria; there is nothing left in the upper halls.'”
Rarity:	C
